acceptOwnership().details: Can only be called by the pending owner after timelock expires

acceptRenounceOwnership().details: Can only be called by the current owner after timelock expires      NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner,      thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._owner: Address that will own the contract

returns._0: The oracle used by the manageable oracle

oracleVerification(address).details: This function checks that:      - Oracle address is not zero      - Oracle quote token matches the stored quote token      - Oracle can provide a valid quote for the base token

returns._0: The address of the current owner

returns.validAt: The timestamp at which the pending oracle becomes valid

pendingOwnership().details: If address is zero, it means pending renounce, otherwise pending transfer

returns.validAt: The timestamp at which the pending ownership change becomes valid
The timestamp at which the pending timelock becomes valid

params._oracle: The new oracle address to propose

params._timelock: The new time lock duration in seconds

params.newOwner: The new owner address to propose

returns._0: The time lock duration in seconds

acceptOracle().notice: Accept and execute the pending oracle update (can only be called by owner after time lock expires)

acceptOwnership().notice: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer

acceptTimelock().notice: Accept and execute the pending timelock update (can only be called by owner after time lock expires)

cancelOracle().notice: Cancel the pending oracle update (can only be called by owner)

cancelRenounceOwnership().notice: Cancel the pending ownership renounce (can only be called by owner)

cancelTimelock().notice: Cancel the pending timelock update (can only be called by owner)

cancelTransferOwnership().notice: Cancel the pending ownership transfer (can only be called by owner)

oracle().notice: Get the current oracle used by the manageable oracle

oracleVerification(address).notice: Verify that the oracle is valid and can provide quotes for the base token

owner().notice: Get the current owner of the contract

pendingOracle().notice: Get the pending oracle address (if any)

pendingOwnership().notice: Get the pending ownership change (if any)

pendingTimelock().notice: Get the pending time lock duration (if any)

proposeOracle(address).notice: Propose a new oracle address (can only be called by owner)

proposeRenounceOwnership().notice: Propose ownership renounce (can only be called by owner)

proposeTimelock(uint32).notice: Propose a new time lock duration (can only be called by owner)

proposeTransferOwnership(address).notice: Propose a new ownership transfer (can only be called by owner)

timelock().notice: Get the current time lock duration
